title: UK firm turns discarded gum into shoes, coffee cups, and combs
text:
UK firm turns discarded gum into shoes, coffee cups, and combs 9:09pm IST - 02:15 
Chewing gum is a blight on city streets and takes a heavy toll on the environment, say its critics. But one woman in Britain is performing modern-day alchemy on it - Gumdrop founder Anna Bullus - as Amber Austin-Wright found out. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Chewing gum is a blight on city streets and takes a heavy toll on the environment, say its critics. But one woman in Britain is performing modern-day alchemy on it - Gumdrop founder Anna Bullus - as Amber Austin-Wright found out.
